channel.title: Port of Plymouth Canoe Association on Insights for Action
channel.description: Recent content in Port of Plymouth Canoe Association on Insights for Action

item.title: Mountbatten to Wembury
item.description: Photo Credit: Helga Pinn Facebook This was a cold, dark and very flat day. Nice paddle though. Over 12 miles. Did some rock hopping in unchallenging conditions.
